channel.title: Product on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Product on SoftLayer API

item.title: checkItemAvailability
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [SoftLayer_Product_Item_Price, int, string]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Product_Order/checkItemAvailability'

item.title: checkItemAvailabilityForImageTemplate
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [int, int, int, string]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Product_Order/checkItemAvailabilityForImageTemplate'

item.title: getItemPricesFromSoftwareDescriptions
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [SoftLayer_Software_Description, boolean, boolean]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Product_Package/{SoftLayer_Product_PackageID}/getItemPricesFromSoftwareDescriptions'

item.title: getNetworks
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [int, int, int]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Product_Order/getNetworks'

item.title: getVlans
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [int, int, string, int, int, int, SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order, boolean]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Product_Order/getVlans'
